name: 0.8 - Bust (living mask)
description:
810px x 608px
Stop-motion animated GIF - montage 
Performer’s bust (chest, neck and head) moving and breathing.

The eighth of ten pieces that make up "Series 0: Performer’s body static archive". This series tries to show in each separate piece, the performer's body. The work does not pretend to be an objective approach of the body but rather to operate like an impression. 

Additional pdf content with your purchase.
